clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of SHR4640 in Subjects With Gout
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase3, Multicentre, Randomized, Double-Blind, Allopurinol and Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SHR4640 Monotherapy in Subjects With Gout

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess the serum uric acid lowering effects and safety of SHR4640 compared to placebo and Allopurinol in patients with gout
